Query:
SELECT 
					nvl(sm.applicationid, ' '),
					p.cardpan,
					s.firstname || ' ' || s.lastname,
					sm.mdn,
					TO_CHAR (FROM_TZ(CAST(s.activationtime AS TIMESTAMP),'+00:00') AT TIME ZONE '$(TimeZone)',  'DD-MM-YYYY'),
					s.createdBy,
					TO_CHAR (FROM_TZ(CAST(s.lastupdatetime AS TIMESTAMP),'+00:00') AT TIME ZONE '$(TimeZone)',  'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),
					et.DisplayText
				FROM
					subscriber s, 
					subscriber_mdn sm, 
					pocket p, 
					enum_text et 
				WHERE 
					s.id = sm.subscriberid
					and s.type=0 
					and p.mdnid = sm.id 
					and p.pockettemplateid=4 
					and et.tagid=5024 
					and et.enumcode=s.status 
					and s.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
					and s.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
				order by s.activationtime;
